topic.title: EMERGENCY CARE INJURY ALCOHOL OR DRUG INVOLVEMENT (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: EMERGENCY CARE INJURY ALCOHOL OR DRUG INVOLVEMENT (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify any drugs or alcohol used by the PATIENT, which are thought likely to have contributed to the need to attend the Emergency Care Department.
